name: Bullet Of Stone
description:
This is a game about a rocky creature who's in a deep underground cave and, fighting monstrous slimes.

This is a challenging game that goes on for ever. Dodge spike's, eliminate the slimes and don't fall in a deep hole. Have fun!!!

feel free to post your feed back in the comments

Controls:

  • Jump:    Spacebar
  • Aim:       Mouse
  • Fire:       Left mouse button
  • Menu:   Esc
  • Retry:    G

If you can't jump just reload the page.
